name: PublishLinuxPackagesPMC
helpMarkDown: For use in the release pipeline for adding one or more packages to packages.microsoft.com
author: aztuxrepo@microsoft.com

inputs.name: profile
inputs.label: Upload Profile
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pick a profile configuration for your package upload. Defaults to prod.

inputs.name: msal_SNIAuth
inputs.label: Subject Name Issuer Auth
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please choose whether to use Subject Name Issue Auth.

inputs.name: msal_cert
inputs.label: Publisher Cert
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please enter your cert, retrieved from KeyVault, in the form $(MY_CERT_FROM_KEYVAULT).

inputs.name: msal_client_ID
inputs.label: Publishing Account ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please provide your publishing account ID.

inputs.name: package_path
inputs.label: Package Source Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please provide the directory path of your package from root.

inputs.name: repository
inputs.label: Repository name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please provide the destination repo name with the specified type suffix (-apt, -yum).
